name: Unison Escape
description:
A puzzle room game in which two players are JOINED TOGETHER — a ragtag team trying to help each other progress through the rooms so they can finally meet! 

Credits: 

Rebecca Archer - Concept, level design, mechanism mechanics & locomotion

Dexter André Tofteland - General programming, interaction & camera mechanics

Ulaş Kaya - Menu programming, jump mechanic

Abracadaniel - SFX and music

Additional assets: 

AllSkyFree: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/allsky-free-10-s...
